title: How to properly write a listing essay - Quora

response.answer_text: Most of the time, the format for an essay depends on the nature of the topic of discussion. However, all simple essays follow a similar structure to ensure the clarity of delivery. A listing essay is a kind of essay that discusses a topic containing a list. The list can include any item - living or inanimate. If the topic can appear in the form of a list, then it is advisable to write a listing essay.  How to approach the writing process Before you write your listing essay, you should always research the topic of discussion properly. Spending some time to brainstorm will provide you with a better understanding of the subject matter. After getting a proper comprehension of the topic, you can now draft your essay. Structure of A Listing Essay Writing a listing essay is quite easy if you understand the structure. It is essential to understand this general approach to help you properly write a listing essay. After coming up with a rough draft for your essay based on the research, you should commence with the writing proper. Here are the main parts of a listing essay: Title The title of a listing essay should give the reader the notion that the content will involve enumeration of some points. For example, a title like “Best tourist destinations in Italy” conveys to the reader what will be the focus of the essay. The body of the essay This section examines the central message of the paper in concise detail. The body of an essay contains 5 main paragraphs: introduction, main body, conclusion. Introduction - This paragraph should capture the attention of the user. It provides a quick overview of what the essay encompasses. At the end of the paragraph, the thesis statement should follow immediately. This single sentence should refer back to the title of the essay.Main body - This section contains three well-explored paragraphs. Also, this section is the most essential because it explores the core ideas of the essay. The exploration of the topic should follow three different criteria in correlation with the number of paragraphs. For our chosen topic, you can decide to discuss the best tourist destinations according to different parameters like food, monuments, and historical significance. Also, you can dedicate each paragraph to a particular destination in the country. It is always a good practice to maintain a seamless flow of ideas by making use of linking words where necessary.Conclusion The conclusion is the final paragraph that summarizes the entire essay. A word count for a proper conclusion should fall with the range of 50-70 words. This paragraph contains deductions from the main point in the essay. It is unnecessary to introduce any new ideas while writing the conclusion. Ultimately, if you want to write an effective listing essay, you would be better off choosing a suitable topic of discussion. Try to follow a definite structure that ensures proper arrangement and expression of your core ideas. If you follow these guidelines, you will always come up with an outstanding listing essay.
